analysis.description:
Market._awardForRecommender (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a9771775ed9a5e3440f89ad790764c188e16191.sol#461-476) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- recommender.transfer(agency_fee) (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a9771775ed9a5e3440f89ad790764c188e16191.sol#471)

Market._gambling (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a9771775ed9a5e3440f89ad790764c188e16191.sol#482-498) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(hit_funds) (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a9771775ed9a5e3440f89ad790764c188e16191.sol#493)
